\h(《Fina》)There's a breach in the hull!
Vyse, it's dangerous if we continue on like
this!\c

\h(《Vyse》)Arrgh… how is it making this noise?!  I thought
this thing was just going to be an over-sized
canary, but it looks like I was wrong!\c

\h(《Aika》)Vyse, if we let that thing grab us one more time
with its claws, we're done for!\e
\h(《What will you do?》)

“Fly next to it and see what happens…”
“We must attack now!  Get behind it!”\c"

\h(《Vyse》)I can't tell what he's gonna do next.  Just fly
up next to it and let's see if we can figure
out what it's gonna do…\e

\h(《Aika》)Aye aye, captain!
This is probably the safest choice for now…\c

\h(《Vyse》)Right now, the most important thing is for us
to find an opportunity to attack!  Turn hard and
get behind it!\e

\h(《Aika》)Aye aye, captain!
We might even get a chance to use the Harpoon
Cannon!\c
\h(《What will you do?》)

“Keep going straight”
“Ready or not… take it head on!”\e"

\h(《Vyse》)Wait… continue on this course.
Animals can smell fear.  If we run, it'll
probably chase us down.\e

\h(《Aika》)Good thinking!  It is only a bird after all…
Let's stay our course.\c

\h(《Vyse》)Alright!  Let's take our chances… take 'em
head on!\e

\h(《Aika》)Going for a high-riskhigh-return strategy?
Just be careful of its attacks, too!\c
\h(《What will you do next?》)

“Get behind it!”
“Take it head on!”\c"

\h(《Aika》)What?
Where'd it go?\e

\h(《Fina》)Aika!  Behind us!
It somehow got behind us when were weren't
looking!\c

\h(《Aika》)Aaaahh!
What is this huge thing?!\e

\h(《Fina》)It's… 
It's the giant bird of legend from South Ocean,
the Roc!\e

\h(《Vyse》)This is our next opponent?  Heh… this is going
to be fun.  Bring it on!\c
